cast.name: 杰瑞米·艾恩斯 Jeremy Irons
帕特里克·麦拉海德 Patrick Malahide

introduction: Based on the bestselling novel by Sándor Márai(as translated by Carol Brown Janeway)“Irons gives the best and most subtle stage production of his career…Michael Blakemore’s steely but delicate and lucid production has a sense of tragedy both monumental and fragile.”The Sunday TimesEMBERS is a compelling story of love, friendship and betrayal set against the backdrop of war-torn 1940s Europe.Henrik, a retired general from the Austro-Hungarian army eagerly awaits the arrival of his dearest childhood friend, Konrad, a man he has not seen for several decades. They were last together on a fateful hunting trip when Konrad mysteriously fled Vienna, leaving behind Henrik and his beautiful wife Krisztina. Will the reunion bring answers to the questions that have haunted Henrik’s life with such intensity?“I was fired, moved and enthralled by Embers. I rate it as one of the major experiences of my theatre-going life…a fascinating, Ibsenite exploration of the past.” The Evening Standard——————————————————————————————根据 Sándor Márai 的畅销小说改编(由Carol Brown Janeway翻译）导演：Michael Blakemore编剧：Christopher Hampton“Jeremy Irons奉献了其职业生涯中最优秀、最精妙的戏剧...Michael Blakemore坚毅而又细腻明晰的制作既有不朽的悲剧感，又有脆弱的悲剧感”。——The Sunday TimesEMBERS以战火纷飞的 20 世纪 40 年代的欧洲为背景，讲述了一个关于爱情、友谊和背叛的引人入胜的故事。Henrik是奥匈帝国军队的一名退役将军，他热切地等待着儿时最亲爱的朋友Konrad的到来。他们最后一次相聚是在一次命运攸关的狩猎之旅中，当时Konrad神秘地逃离了维也纳，留下了Henrik和他美丽的妻子Krisztina。这次重逢能否为困扰Henrik一生的问题带来答案？“我被EMBERS深深打动，为之着迷。我认为这是我戏剧生涯中最重要的经历之一......这是易卜生式的对过去的探索，引人入胜”。——The Evening Standard
